name: Untitled Golf Game
description:
*CONTROLLER REQUIRED*

How To Play (PlayStation) :

- Move/look around using the joysticks

- Address the ball by pressing triangle

- Switch clubs using L1/R1

- Aim the ball using the right joystick

- To hit the ball:

    1) Hold down R2

    2) Apply desired spin using the right stick

    3) Push the left joystick to the right

    4) Rotate the left joystick clockwise until desired power percentage reached

    5) Release the left joystick.

- Reset the ball by pressing circle

Work in progress so please let me know any bugs. Thank you!
